name: Airstrike
description: You are a pilot of the plane tasked to destroy city, simply erase it from the surface of Earth. Game control is not just easy, it’s very easy. The bomb hatch is always open, simply press ANY key and the bombs will start to fall. Beware of the high buildings – you don’t have that many parachutes. For the lasybones we have a cheat-system, e. g. infinite parachutes, no going-down for the plane, etc. So, just run our game and see it for yourself. Have a nice bombing!
